title: Help?Updating issues.
body:
So today i start the game and i can't log in. It said:"We're unable to log you in because you may be offline". I looked that up and i didn't find any solution that helped. Then i started poking around client and i think i changed server(mine is euw) then i changed it back. Then,previous issue was gone and client was ready to update(it went to older version and said it would try to update again or smth.). And then that litle window pops up where it starts downloading only that it isnt. It's stuck and its not moving anywhere.
**I played yesterday and everything was okay**. 

Thank you for your time and help,it's apriciated.

[](https://ibb.co/dv4LZa)

replies.body: There could be a combination of security blocks and an unstable collection struggling to get you updated.  As a first step, let's make sure your OS settings are allowing your game files to be read and update.  This is best done by going through each step of the #[permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  Try again after and let me know if the results improve.
I tried and it didn't work.Is there any other way to handle this?

For sure, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can work with you directly.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and attach it to your ticket for more context.  We'll see you there!
